tool_description: Check whether a company (or list of companies) is involved in a controversial sector through our data feed (API).
name: Negative Screening
title: Negative Screening

api_list.name: getNegativeScreening
api_list.description: Get negative screening of a given company
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://negative-screening.p.rapidapi.com/exclusion/name/Jack Daniels"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "negative-screening.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://negative-screening.p.rapidapi.com/exclusion/name/{value}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "negative-screening.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
